product_desc:
MANGO is a free mobile application that helps students connect with alumni mentors who match their unique needs easily and confidently.

MANGO acts as networking training wheels to show students how easy and useful it is to access mentoring advice from their alumni network for things like internships, jobs, job shadows, and informational interviews. Everything from the brand name and personalized matching algorithm to the auto-draft messaging and smart coaching features are designed for novice networkers. Along the way, students build network connections that open doors to their desired careers.  

MANGO helps universities to increase the career outcomes of its students without labor-intensive processes, which in turn attracts enrollment, increases student retention, and expands alumni giving.
high_concept: MANGO is OKCupid for student-alumni networking.
name: MANGO
